Name: Beautiful Masseuse
About the game: Players in the game as a beautiful masseuse, running a massage shop. Daily reception of all kinds of city beauty, for their feet and legs massage. Relieve their stress and fulfill self little hobbies. I believe that the previous game to the players brought a lot of expectations, but also left some regrets. The purpose of this work is to make up for the regret and bring more surprises. · Animation system: there are dozens of massage animations, each of which can be divided into preparation, normal, excitement and extreme excitement as the excitement level of the guests rises. Bring the player into the game. · Clothing system: The variety of clothing is enriched, and guests and masseurs can change their clothes. Store pages don't display too much. · Growth system: players can obtain gold COINS, collection value and proficiency by serving customers, which can be used to purchase uniforms, collect clothes and learn massage posture respectively. · Free Angle of view: Players can rotate the Angle of view 360° without dead Angle, and adjust the camera focus and height at will. · In a word, if you like beautiful feet, this is a game not to be missed!
